Title: Establishes "SNAP for all", a state-funded supplemental nutrition assistance program to provide for the state's immigrant population
Summary: Establishes "SNAP for all", a state-funded supplemental nutrition assistance program to provide for those who are excluded from federal SNAP benefits solely due to immigration status; outlines eligibility requirements of applicants and operational requirements of the office of temporary and disability assistance.
LawCode: Add ยง95-b, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to establishing a state-funded supplemental nutrition assistance program to provide for the state's immigrant population
